name: Rep. Jennifer Wexton

7/7

tweet_text:
The President must be held accountable. Only then will our country be able to heal.

6/7

name: Rep. Jennifer Wexton
tweet_text:
The President is personally responsible for putting them in harm’s way.

The House of Representatives moved forward with impeachment because not doing so would allow these horrific actions to go unchecked and risk additional violence, destruction, and damage to our republic.

5/7

name: Rep. Jennifer Wexton
tweet_text:

4/7

tweet_text:
That truth is that the President of the United States incited a violent attack on the Legislative Branch of our government and on our democracy. He assembled a mob of terrorists, whipped them into a frenzy, and sicced them on the U.S. Capitol.

3/7

2/7
